Helpers

{% raw %}

world_to_camera_miqus[source]

world_to_camera_miqus(P, R, T)

Convert points from world to camera coordinates Args P: Nx3 3d points in world coordinates R: 3x3 Camera rotation matrix T: 3x1 Camera translation parameters Returns X_cam: Nx3 3d points in camera coordinates

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

convert_to_camera[source]

convert_to_camera(filename, cam)

Converts the csv file with 3D world coordinates to 3D camera coordinates.

Returns: A numpy array with shape: (num_frames, num_keypoints, dimension)

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %}

Main script

{% raw %}

main[source]

main(args)

Creates a 3D camera coordinates dataset for data collected with miqus cameras.

Returns: Dictionary with all the 3D data for each run.
